quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Paula Abdul and Seasons
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, best. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which statement about American actress and choreographer Paula Abdul is not true?

options.text: Paula has done choreography for ZZ Top.
Paula has a star on Hollywood’s Walk of fame.
Paula choreographed Michael Jacksons Beat It! video.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paula choreographed Michael Jacksons Beat It! video.

questions.question: Which actor was Paula Abduls first husband?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emilio Estevesz

questions.question: This rapper had the biggest hit of his career with the #1 U.S. hit called Baby Got Back.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sir Mix -Alot

questions.question: Which line represents the correct original members of American pop band The Four Seasons?

options.text: Frankie Valli, Bob Guadio, Nick Massi, and Tommy DeVito
Frankie Valli, Bob Guadio, Nick Massi, and Nick Devito
Frankie Valli, Bob Guadio, Joe Long, and Hank Majewski
Frankie Valli, Bob Guadio, Bob Crewe, and Nick Massi

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frankie Valli, Bob Guadio, Nick Massi, and Tommy DeVito

questions.question: Which of these have had relationships with actress and choreographer Paula Abdul?

options.text: Stevie Winwood and Michael Anthony Hall

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arsenio Hall and John Stamos

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kim Carnes

questions.question: American pop band The Four Seasons’ second big hit was called Walk Like a Man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Manfred Mann

questions.question: Which member of The Beatles sang the lead vocals on their song Yellow Submarine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ringo Starr

questions.question: What female artist performed the 2007 song Green Light?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beyonce

questions.question: Paula Abduls first movie acting role was in what 1978 movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Junior High School

questions.question: This group had their first ever U.S. # 1 hit in 1975 with Best of My Love.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eagles

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Airtime

questions.question: What one hit wonder from the 70s gave us the classic hit, Billy, Dont Be A Hero?
